channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- EMUI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- EMUI

item.title: CVE-2021-22490|2024-08-03T18:44:14.067Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Permission verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect the device performance.

item.title: CVE-2021-22415|2024-08-03T18:44:12.966Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Incorrect Calculation of Buffer Size Vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause kernel exceptions with the code.

item.title: CVE-2021-22472|2024-08-03T18:44:13.731Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Improper verification vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-22475|2024-08-03T18:44:13.998Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Improper permission management vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-22438|2024-08-03T18:44:13.310Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a Memory Buffer Improper Operation Limit Vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause malicious code to be executed.

item.title: CVE-2021-22319|2024-08-03T18:37:18.495Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an improper verification vulnerability in smartphones. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause integer overflows.

item.title: CVE-2021-22403|2024-08-03T18:44:12.955Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is a vulnerability of hijacking unverified providers in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow attackers to hijack the device and forge UIs to induce users to execute malicious commands.

item.title: CVE-2021-22406|2024-08-03T18:44:13.130Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: There is an Uncaught Exception vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will cause the app to exit unexpectedly.

item.description: There is an Improper Control of Dynamically Managing Code Resources Vulnerability in Huawei Smartphone.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow attempts to remotely execute commands.

item.description: Logical defects in code implementation in some products. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect the availability of some features.
